summary: The comment section is overwhelmingly positive, reflecting strong feelings of pride and solidarity among Muslims worldwide, particularly in support of Pakistan. There is a notable emphasis on Pakistani military achievements, Muslim unity, and criticism of India. The presence of sarcasm and a few toxic comments indicates some level of controversy, especially regarding India-Pakistan relations. The comments also highlight a deep sense of brotherhood within the Muslim Ummah, with frequent mentions of support from various countries. The discussion is emotionally charged, with a focus on geopolitical issues, military capabilities, and religious solidarity.
title: Pakistan Just Humiliated India on the World Stage
